original_text: And it came to pass in those days, that she was sick, and died: whom when they had washed, they laid her in an upper chamber.
korean_text: 그 때에 병들어 죽으매 시체를 씻어 다락에 누이니라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass in those days
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 그 날들에 이러한 일이 있었으니

sentences.original_text: they laid her in an upper chamber
